text: Could baby number four be on the way for Queen Bey? The singer ’ s fans seem convinced she is once again expecting! See their tweets on the matter and Beyonce ’ s slim - fitting bodysuit below! During a July 15 performance in Paris, France, Beyoncé, 36, was absolutely glowing! The singer looked phenomenal as she took to the stage in a chic white bodysuit, and a pair of denim shorts. Over her shoulders she slung a colorful sequin jacket, as she effortlessly danced around the stage. Despite this – fans were completely convinced : Bey is preggers again, and they were not afraid to let their opinions be heard.
